name: Zombie Apocalypse 2:War
description:
After managing to defend her home from the first wave of zombie attack, the zombies are angry and come back with every weapon they have in their arsenal for a second wave. But our hero has a few upgrades herself.
New Features:
● Boss Level
● Awesome Power ups
● New Enemies ● Swordplay Introduced
● New Levels Introduced

Classic Features:
● shoot down multiple zombies
● Test your survival skills
● Test your patience levels as the enemies just won't let up
● Defend yourself with many cool weapons
● Fight against the alpha zombie
and Lots More
